getFacetProvider(int).Description: Queries @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FacetProvider_E@ for a given type within Adapter.

ClassDesc: Optional interface that implemented by @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#Adapter_E@ to query @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FacetProvider_E@ for a given type within Adapter. Note that @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#ViewHolder_E@ may also implement @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FacetProvider_E@ which has a higher priority than the one returned from the FacetProviderAdapter.
